sentences.sContent: The injection technic develops gradually with the deeper exploitation to oilfield.
sentences.sContent_eng: The injection technic develops gradually with the deeper exploitation to oilfield.
sentences.sCn: 注水技术是随着油田的深度开采而逐步发展起来的。

sentences.sContent: This paper introduces three kinds of bacteria which are the most hazardous for oilfield water injection, namely sulfate reducing bacteria, iron bacteria and saprophytic bacteria.
sentences.sContent_eng: This paper introduces three kinds of bacteria which are the most hazardous for oilfield water injection, namely sulfate reducing bacteria, iron bacteria and saprophytic bacteria.
sentences.sCn: 摘要油田注入水中硫酸盐还原菌、铁细菌、腐生菌是危害最大的细菌，这三种细菌特性各异，相互之间还存在一定的联系。

trans.tranOther: an area of land or sea under which there is oil
